title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Full document fingerprinting
description:
Document Fingerprinting in Microsoft Purview
Data Loss Prevention (DLP) converts a standard form into a sensitive
information type (SIT), which you can use in the rules of your DLP policies.
This update extends support for Fingerprint-based SITs to additional workloads,
including SharePoint, OneDrive, Teams, and Endpoint and enables admins to
adjust threshold while creating Fingerprint SITs.
